item.description: Walk one mile to the famous 165‑foot Heublein Tower in Talcott Mountain State Park in Simsbury at 11 am.  At top, we'll have a fantastic view of four states!   Hopefully, the leaves will be bright and colorful.   After walk, we'll go nearby for lunch.   No charge for walk.   For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.   Directions: I‑84 Exit 39 Farmington (Rt. 4), turn right onto Rt. 10, go about 8‑9 miles to end (cross over Rt. 44), turn right onto Rt. 185, follow signs, meet in parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Walk and Lunch
